Source.Name: xbindkeys
Source.Summary: Launch shell commands with your keyboard or your mouse under X
Source.Description: xbindkeys is a program that allows you to launch shell commands with your keyboard or your mouse under X Window. It links commands to keys or mouse buttons, using a configuration file. It's independant of the window manager and can capture all keyboard keys (ex: Power, Wake...).
